overview: On the 8th of March, 2014, Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 vanished during a routine flight between Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and Beijing, China. The case has since grown into one of the most puzzling mysteries in aviation history. This documentary examines the findings of the official investigation and explore some of the leading theories.
tagline: "Malaysian Three Seven Zero Lumpur Radar how do you read, do you read."
title: The Vanishing of Flight 370
